Package com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.time

Interface TimeMeasurement

All Superinterfaces:
LongValued, Zeroable
All Known Subinterfaces:
LengthOfTime<Duration>, PointInTime<Time,Duration>
public interface TimeMeasurement extends LongValued
Interface for all time measurements, whether a LengthOfTime or a PointInTime.

Measurement

  • nanoseconds()
  • milliseconds()

Conversion

A length of time can be converted to specific time units by calling one of the following methods:

  • asNanoseconds()
  • asMicroseconds()
  • asMilliseconds()
  • asSeconds()
  • asMinutes()
  • asHours()
  • asDays()
  • asWeeks()
  • asYears()
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
